Comment.Language: Regardless of if the Veneration service is celebrated for a saint/martyr other than Saint Mary, the verse for Saint Mary is chanted first, as below:

Text.Language: Qen v~ran m~Viwt nem Ps/ri nem Pip~neuma eyouab }t~riac eyouab n~o~mooucioc:
In the name of the Father, and the Son, and the Holy Spirit, the Holy and co-essential Trinity:
بأسم الآب والابن والروح القدس الثالوث المساوى:
Worthy, worthy, worthy, is Saint Mary the Virgin.
مستحقة مستحقة مستحقة القديسة مريم العذراء.
